mapper.update: UPDATE t_permission_info SET resource_id = #{resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation_id = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, permission_desc = #{permissionDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{permissionName, jdbcType=CHAR}, access_type = #{accessType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND permission_id = #{pk.permissionId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
